body.section: The Workbench IDE provides a convenience plugin that can autogenerate the necessary member, marked parent and specification refset concepts for a new refset. The user is prompted for the name of the refset, and the plugin creates the concepts "<name> refset spec", "<name> marked parent", and "<name> refset", as indicated in .

fig.title: Autogenerating the 3 refset concepts - refset spec, marked parent & refset
